name: Cutlass
description: The Cutlass is a sword obtainable at the Sword Dealer at Marine Starter or Pirate Starter.

attacks.name: Quiet Rush
attacks.description: The user dashes forward, dealing damage to enemies in the way.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.description: A slash that goes through the air and deals damage and knocks back every enemy in its path.

name: Shark Saw
description: The Shark Saw is a sword obtainable by killing the Saw.

attacks.name: Consecutive Slashes
attacks.description: The user swings the sword two times diagonally before releasing a heavy slash vertically, knocking the enemy back. The slashes have a black and dark red aura.

attacks.name: Execution
attacks.description: The user spins around in a circle while moving towards the cursor, slashing the sword around them. When hitting an enemy, they get pulled in and receive continuous damage. When the move finishes, the player does a small horizontal slash, dealing knockback and damage to the enemies caught in by the attack.

name: Saw
description: Saw is a boss that appears every 1h15 in the First Sea.
